# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(c LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(c "")
set_target_properties(c PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "c")
set_target_properties(c PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(c PRIVATE
    /Users/zz/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.81.0/d67836a15f89412aa0014c3c609beb8b/include
    /usr/local/include
    /usr/local/include/SDL2
)
target_compile_definitions(c PRIVATE
    _THREAD_SAFE
)
target_compile_options(c PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(c PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(c PRIVATE c_std_99)
set_target_properties(c PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(c PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(c PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(c PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(c PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET c PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(c PRIVATE
    boost_fiber-mt
    boost_coroutine-mt
    boost_context-mt
    boost_regex-mt
    boost_system-mt
    boost_container-mt
    boost_exception-mt
    boost_timer-mt
    boost_atomic-mt
    boost_graph-mt
    boost_serialization-mt
    boost_random-mt
    boost_wave-mt
    boost_date_time-mt
    boost_locale-mt
    boost_iostreams-mt
    boost_program_options-mt
    boost_chrono-mt
    boost_contract-mt
    boost_json-mt
    boost_log_setup-mt
    boost_log-mt
    boost_thread-mt
    boost_filesystem-mt
    boost_nowide-mt
    boost_type_erasure-mt
    SDL2
    z
)
target_link_directories(c PRIVATE
    /Users/zz/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.81.0/d67836a15f89412aa0014c3c609beb8b/lib
    /usr/local/lib
)
target_link_options(c PRIVATE
    -target
    x86_64-apple-macos12.6
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(c PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(test "")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "test")
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/macosx/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(test PRIVATE
    /Users/zz/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.81.0/d67836a15f89412aa0014c3c609beb8b/include
)
target_compile_options(test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-target>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:x86_64-apple-macos12.6>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(test PRIVATE c_std_99)
set_target_properties(test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(test PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(test PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(test PRIVATE
    boost_fiber-mt
    boost_coroutine-mt
    boost_context-mt
    boost_regex-mt
    boost_system-mt
    boost_container-mt
    boost_exception-mt
    boost_timer-mt
    boost_atomic-mt
    boost_graph-mt
    boost_serialization-mt
    boost_random-mt
    boost_wave-mt
    boost_date_time-mt
    boost_locale-mt
    boost_iostreams-mt
    boost_program_options-mt
    boost_chrono-mt
    boost_contract-mt
    boost_json-mt
    boost_log_setup-mt
    boost_log-mt
    boost_thread-mt
    boost_filesystem-mt
    boost_nowide-mt
    boost_type_erasure-mt
    z
)
target_link_directories(test PRIVATE
    /Users/zz/.xmake/packages/b/boost/1.81.0/d67836a15f89412aa0014c3c609beb8b/lib
)
target_link_options(test PRIVATE
    -target
    x86_64-apple-macos12.6
    -isysroot
    /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk
    -stdlib=libc++
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    test/test.cpp
)
